title: IT Technical Support (Field) NEW!
full_description: We are seeking an IT Technical Support to join our team! You will resolve computer-related issues for your clients.Responsibilities:Provide technical assistance with computer hardware and software, printer setup and support, and network setup and support (90% residential clients/10% small business clients)Provide instruction and training in Microsoft Office products, Windows 10, Big Sur, Android, and iOS devices.Smart TV installation and training.Email account support (set up, troubleshooting, and instruction)Resolve issues for clients via phone, in person, or electronicallyRecommend and implement hardware and software improvementsTrack customer issues and resolutionsQualifications:2+ years previous experience in IT, customer service, or other related fieldsAbility to build rapport with clientsStrong troubleshooting and critical thinking skillsDetail orientedPositive and professional demeanor
